page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content: There are 10 schools in the area of Yateley and part of Sandhurst which cater for primary children from 5 to 11 years of age. These are all state schools and two of them are Church of England controlled. In addition there are many private play schools. When children are ready for secondary education there are four schools to which they might go, two of which are in this grid. There are also two private schools, one mainly for boys and the other for girls. Both have a department for very young children. The two comprehensive schools are commmunity schools and they both have their own sixth form. There are very many facilities for extra curricular activities, including sports, adult classes and swimming.
